feed.title: Re: PAPER: New algorithm for the discrete logarithm problem on elliptic curves

entry.title: Re: PAPER: New algorithm for the discrete logarithm problem on elliptic curves
entry.summary: On April 7, 2015, Gregory Maxwell sent an email apologizing for a false alarm and spamming. The email also contained two links. The first link directs to a PDF file on eprint.iacr.org, while the second link takes us to a Reddit thread about a new algorithm for the discrete logarithm problem.
